title: Apple reports better-than-expected quarter driven by iPhone sales
description: Apple reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

title: Americans haven't been this worried about their bank deposits since the 2008 financial crisis
description: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. backs deposits up to $250,000 per depositor.

title: Ferrari profit jumps 24% as demand pushes waiting list into 2025
description: Ferrari's EBIT profit margin, a widely-watched figure, increased a full percentage point to 26.9%.

title: Virgin Islands issued subpoena to Google co-founder Larry Page in lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase over Jeffrey Epstein
description: The U.S. Virgin Islands is suing JPMorgan Chase for alleged complicity in sex trafficking by Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Crypto has ‘lost its shine’ for institutional investors, says Northern Trust executive
description: Institutions lost interest in crypto after 2022 and their appetite for it hasn't come back yet, according to Northern Trust's Justin Chapman.

title: How China’s slower post-Covid recovery is playing out for our Club stocks this earnings season
description: But, we believe it's only a matter of time until a post-Covid reopening accelerates the world's second-largest economy.

title: Ed Sheeran didn't steal from Marvin Gaye's 'Let's Get It On,' jury rules
description: Pop star Ed Sheeran didn't commit copyright infringement with his 2014 hit “Thinking Out Loud,” a jury decided.

title: Regional bank stocks continue to slide on Thursday with PacWest leading the way down 54%
description: Thursday's moves come less than a week after First Republic was seized by regulators and sold at a discount to JPMorgan Chase.

title: 66% of renters say homeownership is 'hopeless'—here's how they'd rather spend their money
description: Most renters are focused on saving for retirement savings or paying off debt rather than buying a house.

title: Shopify cuts 20% of its workforce; shares surge on earnings beat
description: The cuts represent the second round of layoffs for Shopify in the last year.

title: Britain launches probe into ChatGPT-style A.I. as regulators grow concerned by risks
description: The U.K. Competition and Markets Authority on Thursday launched an investigation into the artificial intelligence industry.

title: Billionaire Richard Branson defends space travel, argues it can benefit planet
description: The entrepreneur's comments were made during an extensive interview with the BBC.

title: European Central Bank raises rates by 25 basis points, slowing the pace of hikes
description: The European Central Bank announced a new rate decision as inflation remains well-above its target.

title: Samsung union threatens first strike in company's history as pressure mounts after profit plunge
description: Samsung is facing a testing time after its operating profit in the first quarter plunged to its lowest level since 2009 on weak memory chip demand.

title: 'We're not at the moon yet': Human-like A.I. is still some way off, early investor in Google's DeepMind says
description: We are still some way off reaching human-level artificial intelligence despite rapid advances in the technology, an early investor in DeepMind told CNBC.

title: False flag? Analysts says Russia 'likely staged' Kremlin drone attack it blamed on Ukraine and the West
description: Speculation is mounting that Russia staged a drone attack on the Kremlin that it blamed on Ukraine Wednesday.

title: Novo Nordisk cuts some U.S. supply of Wegovy obesity drug as demand soars
description: Novo Nordisk said Thursday that it was cutting the supply of some doses of its popular obesity drug in the U.S. as it struggles to keep up with surging demand.

title: Volkswagen posts drop in quarterly profit, says it must speed up to catch Chinese EV market rivals
description: Volkswagen said operating profit fell 31% to 5.7 billion euros ($6.3 billion) through the first three months of 2023.

title: Microsoft opens up Bing access and adds chat history and export features
description: The new version of Bing has yet to gain search advertising market share, but Microsoft has limited its availability. Now that's changing.

title: Tech giant PDD Holdings, parent of Pinduoduo and Temu, moves headquarters from China to Ireland
description: PDD Holdings' move perhaps signals the Chinese tech giant's attempt to boost its international presence with U.S. shopping app Temu.

title: Oil giant Shell beats expectations with $9.6 billion in first-quarter profit
description: British oil giant Shell on Thursday posted stronger-than-anticipated first-quarter profit, extending a record run of bumper results.

title: Budweiser-owner AB InBev reports profit hike as beer drinkers shoulder higher prices
description: The beer industry demonstrated "resilience even in the context of an ongoing inflationary environment," the biggest brewer in the world said.

title: Spain's drought has pushed olive oil prices to a 26-year high — and they're expected to stick
description: Olive oil prices have hit record levels, thanks to a prolonged drought in top producer Spain — and the elevated prices are expected to stay for some time.

title: European Central Bank set to slow rate hikes as financial conditions tighten rapidly
description: The new economic figures both strengthen the case for the ECB to only hike rates by a smaller amount at is policy meeting.

title: Auto giants are setting their sights on a new growth market for EVs: India
description: Companies like Audi, Volvo Cars and Stellantis are looking to establish a foothold in a market already home to some big India-based players.

title: This digital nomad worked in 20 countries in 5 years. Here are her best money tips
description: "Every single month doesn't look the same because you're often in different areas, with different currencies, and there are different expenses," said Daniella Pashuk.
